channel.title: How i can compile Client ? L O O K
channel.description:
So, when im trying to compile the client what i made i always get this : [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/358x575.jpg[/img]
So if you know what the problem is, reply please. -
Thanks, Problem..

item.title: How i can compile Client ? L O O K
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“Minardi007, post:10, topic:240970”]wtf please take it easy 3 lines and there he comes
@echo off
title tajkillerscape compiler
…
omg 3 lines to compile NO
2 lines echo off dont need and pause but then its exit when u clear hold it on 2 LINES

@echo off
javac *.java[/quote]
If you don’t pause and their is errors it won’t let you see them for more than 1 second.

Read full topic

item.title: How i can compile Client ? L O O K

item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

Your Java Path is not set to where your Java folder is.

item.title: How i can compile Client ? L O O K
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“tajkillerscape, post:7, topic:240970”]What type of java do you have? Try to use my complier here ya go… @echo off title tajkillerscape compiler echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: echo :: Welcome to tajtas Compiler For Java 6.07 :: echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/quote]
That’s not your compiler.

Read full topic

pause
[/quote]
